## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description           | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | --------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | disabled              | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `text`     | `text`     | render button as text | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `type`     | `type`     | html button type      | `string`  | `'button'`  |
